name: Literally infected: The Sorcerer's Apprentice, 2000/21
description: The original text of Johann Wolfgang von Goethe's poem "The Sorcerer's Apprentice" (German: "Der Zauberlehrling") from 1797 was converted into the source code of a JPEG file by Markus Wirthmann in 2000 and minted as an NFT in 2021.
